In England, in the seven days to 31 March, there were 423,251 new confirmed cases (748.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 March, there were 501,244 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (77,993 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 April is 18,027,644 (31,879 cases per 100,000 population).
